import * as ioicons from 'react-icons/io' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import * as bsIcons from 'react-icons/bs'; import {motion} from 'framer-motion' const Education = () => { const line = "EDUCATION" const sentence = { hidden: {opacity:1}, visible : { opacity:1, transition: { delay:0.5, staggerChildren:0.6, }, }, } const letter = { hidden : { opacity:0,y:50}, visible : { opacity:1, y:0, }, } return (
{ line.split("").map((char,index) => { return ( {char} ) }) }

THE INDIAN SCHOOL

(2006-2018)

New Delhi,India

SRM Institute of Science and Technology

(2019-2023)

Kattankulathur,Chennai,India

) } export default Education
